41 YEARS OF NEPAL-UAE RELATIONSHIPS!

Nepal and the United Arab Emirates have established their diplomatic relations on 22 January 1977. Nepal has established its residential embassy at Abu Dhabi on 11 April 2004 whereas UAE erstablished its Embassy at Kathmandu on 10 May 2016.

The embassy hosted a farewell Program to CDA a.i. Mr. Netra Bahadur Tandan on Saturday, 13.1.2018 who's returning to Nepal after completing his tenure. He served in Paris,Washington DC & Yangoon before joining Abu Dhabi in 2014.
We wish him healthy & happy life ahead!
